title: 想請教下樓宇結構知識 做struc E嘅您幫一幫手

replies.msg:
想問下香港近排起嘅residential樓steel ratio會係roughly幾多？唔同element e.g slab, column 同beam又大約幾多到？

如果有個site起普通住宅；slab thickness 大部份都係150mm 少量200mm FRR 60-120; slab嘅rebar 9成用10mm T鐵；slab嘅steel ratio 80kg/m3 合唔合理？

講到1999有錯請指教 唔係做struc e呢行不過工作需要所以想知多啲

Concrete code la
Steel ratio好似係講area

Concrete code la
Steel ratio好似係講area

我都有望過但係就係搵唔到啲general steel ratio做referenece 如果ratio係/area 就大約係 14/m2

t10 150 cc? 夠take 咩？

個senior都話怪怪地 不過我唔識呢啲

Concrete code la
Steel ratio好似係講area

我都有望過但係就係搵唔到啲general steel ratio做referenece 如果ratio係/area 就大約係 14/m2

冇記錯應該係
Steel area / slab area per meter

知嚟做乜先

方便做野拎黎check下自己會唔會deviate得太多

Concrete code la
Steel ratio好似係講area

我都有望過但係就係搵唔到啲general steel ratio做referenece 如果ratio係/area 就大約係 14/m2

冇記錯應該係
Steel area / slab area per meter


Ching咁你記唔記得slab嘅general ratio

Concrete code la
Steel ratio好似係講area

我都有望過但係就係搵唔到啲general steel ratio做referenece 如果ratio係/area 就大約係 14/m2

冇記錯應該係
Steel area / slab area per meter


Ching咁你記唔記得slab嘅general ratio

Minimum steel percentage (Cl. 9.3.1.1(a) of the Code): Main Reinforcing bars:
0.24%for fy 250MPaand0.13%for fy 500MPa; Distribution bars in one way slab  20% of the main reinforcements
(ii) Maximum reinforcements spacing (Cl. 9.3.1.1(b) of the Code):
(a) In general areas without concentrated loads :
the principal reinforcement, max. spacing 3h400mm; and
the secondary reinforcement, max. spacing  3.5h  450 mm.
(b) In areas with concentrated loads or areas of maximum moment:
theprincipalreinforcement,max.spacing 2h250mm;and forthesecondaryreinforcement,max.spacing 3h40

Concrete code la
Steel ratio好似係講area

我都有望過但係就係搵唔到啲general steel ratio做referenece 如果ratio係/area 就大約係 14/m2

冇記錯應該係
Steel area / slab area per meter


Ching咁你記唔記得slab嘅general ratio

Minimum steel percentage (Cl. 9.3.1.1(a) of the Code): Main Reinforcing bars:
0.24%for fy 250MPaand0.13%for fy 500MPa; Distribution bars in one way slab  20% of the main reinforcements
(ii) Maximum reinforcements spacing (Cl. 9.3.1.1(b) of the Code):
(a) In general areas without concentrated loads :
the principal reinforcement, max. spacing 3h400mm; and
the secondary reinforcement, max. spacing  3.5h  450 mm.
(b) In areas with concentrated loads or areas of maximum moment:
theprincipalreinforcement,max.spacing 2h250mm;and forthesecondaryreinforcement,max.spacing 3h40


唔該曬ching你先
你拎本RC CODE睇下就知道
